Content.Text:
This looks bad! He needs some water, 
and quick!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Ah, now I remember. I was searching for
some food and collapsed due to the heat.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<NAME_UNKOWN>It looks like I have you to thank for
saving me. I appreciate it.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<NAME_UNKOWN>I can't say I've ever seen you in these
parts, though.
<PAGE>
I hope you don't take offense if I've
got this wrong, but are you <MYNAME>?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Ah, you are! Did your parents tell you
about me? My name is <BLUE>Dunhill</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's such a strong family
resemblance, it caught me off guard!
It feels like I already know you.
<PAGE>
I've known your folks for a long time.
They sent a letter saying you were
coming.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What did they say?
<PAGE>
Why, only that they were sending me an
extremely hard worker, and I should make
use of them however I please!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah hah. I'm joking, don't worry.
The town is this way. Follow me.
